domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @Keir_Starmer A punishing No Deal Brexit hot on the heels of a catastrophic pandemic will certainly not be met with alacrity. In fact, to pursue such a policy after months of economic decline, public health crisis and crimped freedoms, would be an act of unfathomable cruelty. We must resist.
